item.description:
Hi Everyone,

The weather for Saturday looks pretty good with temperatures in the upper 30's and partly sunny. There are a number of trails of varying levels of difficulty but we'll stay with the less strenuous ones. We can decide when we meet.

As you turn into the road leading to the reservation, there is a parking lot on your right in front of a skating rink and one further up in front of the Visitor Center. Let's meet on the "porch" of the Visitor Center at 11:00.

Afterwards, I'm game for lunch or at least coffee. Kelly's is right down the street or we can pick another place.

Look forward to seeing you there.

Warm regards,

Kathy G

Directions:
From north or south: Take Rte. 1 to Lynn Fells Parkway exit, follow Lynn Fells Parkway a short distance, take a right onto Forest Street. Park entrance is after Kasabuski Rink.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Kathy and her wheaton terrier (change if I got that wrong, Kathy!)

group.name: North Shore Not Too Intense Hikers

item.name: Breakheart Reservation in Saugus
